data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 125 believers in the state of Blida to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Blida, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Blida, Algeria to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary: On average, 44 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Blida, Algeria.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Blida, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Blida.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bedouin, Tajakant people.
Spirit, fill the 125 believers in the state of Blida with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Blida, Algeria to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 125 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Blida.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
